question.title: Spanner emulator slow connection at start
question.body:
When using Spanner Emulator with Testcontainers, it starts up pretty quickly (1-2 seconds) but then the connection from Java takes a very long time (even 2 minutes!). I start it up with:

 new GenericContainer<>(DockerImageName.parse(DOCKER_IMG))
            .withExposedPorts(GRPC_PORT, REST_PORT)
            .withNetworkAliases(NETWORK_ALIAS)
            .withNetwork(containerNetwork)
            .waitingFor(Wait.forLogMessage(".*server listening.*\\n", 2));

Note that the Wait.forLogMessage does not increase the wait time (I tried removing it).

Then the connection with

final Spanner spanner =
    SpannerOptions.newBuilder()
        .setProjectId(projectId)
        .setEmulatorHost(emulatorAddress)
        .setCredentials(NoCredentials.getInstance())
        .build()
        .getService();

takes a very long time, this is the slaw part. Eventually it succeeds, but I would like to speed this up because it's unbearable.

Is there anything I can do to speed this up?
